ability.name: "Fire Up the Night"
ability.flavor: Maybe you and I ♪ We can still bring the light!♪
ability.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.effect: While this performance is active, each target who starts their turn in the area doesn't take a bane on strikes against creatures with concealment. Once during their turn, they can search for hidden creatures as a free maneuver (see Hide and Sneak in Chapter 9: Tests).
